content: knitted vest in drops flora the piece is worked in stocking stitch with ribbed edges sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern no fl-064 yarn group a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops flora from garnstudio 200-200-250-250-300-300 g colour 16 pistachio **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib
